content: 8 and 9 four more times row 32 ws edge p14 k4 p6 k4 p14 edge row 33 rs edge k14 p6 k2 p6 k14 edge now the edge stitches will simply be mentioned as edge continue row 34 ws edge p14 k14 p14 edge to knit them in seed stitch row 35 rs edge k14 p14 k14 edge section 3 the moose body and first part of head row 18 37 row 36 ws edge p14 k14 p14 edge row 18 ws edge p12 k18 p12 edge row 37 rs edge k15 p3 k1 p4 k1 p3 k15 edge row 19 rs edge k13 p16 k13 edge row 20 ws edge p19 k4 p19 edge section 4 the antlers and upper head row 38 47 row 21 rs edge k20 p2 k20 edge row 38 ws edge p4 k6 p5 k2 p2 k4 p2 k2 p5 k6 p4 edge row 22 ws edge p20 k2 p20 edge row 39 rs edge k3 p9 k3 p2 k3 p2 k3 p2 k3 p9 k3 edge row 23 rs edge k20 p2 k20 edge row 40 ws edge p2 k15 p3 k2 p3 k15 p2 edge row 24 ws edge p20 k2 p20 edge row 41 rs edge k2 p16 k1 p4 k1 p16 k2 edge row 25 rs edge k19 p4 k19 edge row 42 ws edge p2 k4 p1 k3 p1 k20 p1 k3 p1 k4 p2 edge row 26 ws edge p17 k8 p17 edge row 43 rs edge k2 p4 k1 p3 k1 p3 k2 p10 k2 p3 k1 p3 k1 row 27 rs edge k16 p3 k4 p3 k16 edge p4 k2 edge row 28 ws edge p15 k3 p6 k3 p15 edge row 44 ws edge p2 k4 p1 k3 p1 k3 p2 k10 p2 k3 p1 k3 p1 k4 p2 edge moose mug dishcloth v2 0 3 row 45 rs edge k2 p4 k1 p3 k1 p3 k2 p10 k2 p3 k1 p3 k1 chart instructions p4 k2 edge row 1 3 5 … this is the right side of the piece knit the white squares and purl the squares with dots the chart is read from right to left from row 46 ws edge p2 k4 p1 k3 p1 k3 p14 k3 p1 k3 p1 k4 p2 stitch 1 to 52 edge row 2 4 6 … this is the wrong side of the piece purl the white row 47 rs edge k3 p2 k3 p1 k3 p1 k16 p1 k3 p1 k3 p2 k3 squares and knit the squares with dots the chart is read from left to edge right from stitch 52 to 1 section 5 upper frame row 48 58 cast on 52 stitches and follow the chart row 48 ws edge p42 edge bind off weave in ends and block row 49 rs edge k42 edge row 50 57 repeat row 48 and 49 four times row 58 repeat row 48 section 6 upper border row 59 65 row 59
